name: Dark Dawn
blurb: Dark Dawn is a Post Apocalyptic, 2D Action, Survival game with hand draw graphics.\nComing to you from developer Genius Dog.

rewards.reward: Our eternal gratitude, along with exclusive Dark Dawn wallpapers, for your PC and mobile devices!
You're getting the game at release date, \r\n\r\n+ the Dark Dawn wallpapers!
Your name will appear in the in-game credits under the special thanks section, \r\n\r\n+ you're getting the game at release date, + the Dark Dawn wallpapers!

SOUNDTRACK PACK: you'll receive a digital copy of the Dark Dawn original soundtrack\r\n\r\n+ your name will appear in the in-game credits under the special thanks section, + you're getting the game at release date, + the Dark Dawn wallpapers!

ART BOOK: You will receive a PDF art book with concept art of the game,+ digital copy of the soundtrack + your name will appear in the in-game credits under the special thanks section, + free copy of the game, + Wallpapers!

An exclusive Dark Dawn t-shirt!(please include 10\u00a3 for the shipping cost in your pledge.) + PDF art book + digital copy of the soundtrack + your name will appear in the in-game credits under the special thanks section, + free copy of the game, + Dark Dawn Wallpapers!
The Exclusive Kickstarter weapon reward! There is going to be a weapon accessible ONLY to people who will pledge this reward or any higher tier + free copy of the game + Dark Dawn Wallpapers!

The Exclusive Kickstarter weapon reward! There is going to be a weapon accessible ONLY to people who will pledge this reward or any higher tier.\r\n\r\n+ Dark Dawn t-shirt(please include 10\u00a3 for the shipping cost in your pledge.) + PDF art book + digital copy of the soundtrack + your name will appear in the in-game credits under the special thanks section, + free copy of the game, + Dark Dawn Wallpapers!

Access to beta version of the game! + Kickstarter exclusive weapon \r\n+ Dark Dawn t-shirt(please include 10\u00a3 for the shipping cost in your pledge.) + PDF art book + digital copy of the soundtrack + your name will appear in the in-game credits under the special thanks section, + free copy of the game, + Dark Dawn Wallpapers!

The Messenger! Tell us a phrase, a word, what ever you want and we will add it in one of the levels in the form of graffiti or a sign.\r\n+ access to the Beta version + Kickstarter exclusive weapon + Dark Dawn t-shirt(please include 10\u00a3 for the shipping cost in your pledge.) + PDF art book + digital copy of the soundtrack + your name will appear in the in-game credits under the special thanks section, + free copy of the game, + Dark Dawn Wallpapers!

The Weapon Designer! You'll work with our artist to design a weapon of your preference,you will be listed as co-creator of the weapon\r\n+ access to the Beta version + Kickstarter exclusive weapon + Dark Dawn t-shirt(please include 10\u00a3 for the shipping cost in your pledge.) + PDF art book + digital copy of the soundtrack + your name will appear in the in-game credits under the special thanks section, + free copy of the game, + Wallpapers!

The Monster Designer! You'll work with our artist to design a monster for the game and have your own creation roam the streets of Dark Dawn, and you will be listed as co-creator of the monster! + access to the Beta version  + Kickstarter exclusive weapon + Dark Dawn t-shirt(please include 10\u00a3 for the shipping cost in your pledge.) + PDF art book + digital copy of the soundtrack + your name will appear in the in-game credits under the special thanks section, + free copy of the game, + Dark Dawn Wallpapers!

The Level Designer! You'll work with our artist to design a level for the game that suits your taste, and you will be listed as co-creator of the level. + access to the Beta version \r\n+ Kickstarter exclusive weapon + Dark Dawn t-shirt(please include 10\u00a3 for the shipping cost in your pledge.) + PDF art book + digital copy of the soundtrack + your name will appear in the in-game credits under the special thanks section, + free copy of the game, + Dark Dawn Wallpapers!

The Collection Reward! you can choose 2 of out of the 3 previous rewards(Weapon, Monster, Level), and work with with our artist to design them, you will be listed as co-creator of those in the credits, + access to the Beta version + Kickstarter exclusive weapon + Dark Dawn t-shirt(please include 10\u00a3 for the shipping cost in your pledge.) + PDF art book + digital copy of the soundtrack + your name will appear in the in-game credits under the special thanks section, + free copy of the game, + Dark Dawn Wallpapers!

The Hero Reward! You'll work with our artist to design a costume for the hero of the game,and you will be listed as co-creator of the Costume, + Kickstarter exclusive weapon + Dark Dawn t-shirt(please include 10\u00a3 for the shipping cost in your pledge.) + PDF art book + digital copy of the soundtrack + your name will appear in the in-game credits under the special thanks section, + free copy of the game, + Dark Dawn Wallpapers!
